officeHours: Monday–Thursday: 8 a.m.–5 p.m., Friday: 8 a.m.–4:30 p.m., Saturday–Sunday: Closed
description:
At Smith Shanklin Sosa in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, our attorneys are dedicated to obtaining the maximum possible compensation for our clients who have suffered personal injury due to someone's negligence or wrongdoing. We know that when such injuries occur, the lives of our clients are turned upside down. Not only do they need to recover from what could be a catastrophic injury, they also face mounting medical bills at precisely the time when they cannot work to bring in money to support themselves and their families.

This is when our law firm shines. We have represented thousands of clients not only in Louisiana, but across the country in all types of personal injury cases, including:

  • Car accidents
  • Truck accidents
  • Boating accidents
  • Aviation accidents
  • Class action suits
  • Mass torts

Serious injuries

Many of our law firm's clients have suffered grievous injuries such as:

  • Head injuries
  • Back injuries
  • Neck injuries
  • Amputations
  • Burns
  • Fractured bones

We also represent grieving families that have lost loved ones to untimely wrongful death. Our law firm's attorneys see it as our duty and our privilege to take on negligent defendants and their insurance companies on behalf of our clients, aggressively representing their interests and never resting until we have obtained the maximum possible settlement or jury award.

Smith Shanklin Sosa provides a free initial consultation to all potential clients during which we listen to their situation and answer their questions. We always treat clients with the respect and dignity they deserve.
